dict.acceptation: 年幼的；有朝气的；年轻人的；青年的；

sent.orig: For a list of such data the reader is referred to Young's extensive compilation.
sent.trans: 有关这种数据的一览表读者可参阅Young的范围广泛的编辑物。

sent.orig: Being the precocious type, I married relatively young, had kids young and got divorced young.
sent.trans: 我比较早熟，年纪轻轻就结婚生子，又在仍旧年纪轻轻的时候离了婚。

sent.orig: I knew, the man in the man is young man, the young man inside old man.
sent.trans: 我知道了，男人中的男人是小男人，大男人里面的小男人。

sent.orig: Daddy will always say Sister and Brother young. Too young to do this and that.
sent.trans: 爸爸总会说姐姐哥哥都还小，不可以这样那样。

sent.orig: Young men think old men fool, old men know young men are.
sent.trans: 青年把老人看成老糊涂，老人把青年看成大傻瓜。
